title: Nadia Whittome – 2022 Comments on Prime Minister’s Interview with Mumsnet
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Nadia Whittome, the Labour MP for Nottingham East, on Twitter on 1 June 2022.
content:
Johnson defends the Downing St parties to Mumsnet, as they had to “keep morale high, when the whole place was under a huge amount of pressure.”
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance

Hospitals? Care homes? Supermarkets?
